Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near 43rd/Michigan
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Michigan, due to street blockage near 43rd/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Michigan, due to street blockage near 43rd/Michigan.

Westbound buses will operate via 43rd, Michigan, 45th, Wabash, 43rd and over regular route.

Eastbound buses will operate via 43rd, Wabash, 45th, Indiana, 43rd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
